name: hobnail
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a short thick nail with a flat top that is fixed into the bottom of boots or shoes to make them last longer : The shoes were rugged footwear with steel heels, toe irons, and hobnails. The thick leather soles were attached to the uppers by hobnails.
a heavy boot or shoe that has nails fixed into the bottom to make it last longer: On his first day of work, he was provided with a brand new pair of hobnails. "Don't scratch the floor with your hobnails," said Martha. Synonym
hobnail boot
More examplesFewer examplesWe can see the hobnails in the sole of this wonderfully preserved shoe.In footwear, a hobnail is a short nail with a thick head used to increase the durability of boot soles.An anti-capitalist protester in hobnails and a tutu was blocking my way.
